website_summaries.verdict: Basic rawhide treats made with quality ingredients. A good choice for most dogs who love to chew as well as pet owners watching their budgets.
pros: Made of natural rawhide without artificial ingredients
Simple, one-sheet rolls that last through prolonged chewing for most dogs
Available in different sizes to suit various breeds
cons: Some chews aren't rolled very tightly, and aggressive chewers can unroll them
A few may experience stomach upset after eating them

customer_reviews.title: ..I'd get something else
customer_reviews.text: None are 1 1/2" thick more like 1 to 1 1/4". 1 out of the 20 was thickish as you see in the pic but the rest are thin. Will not order again. Product of Bolivia.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin Dallas

customer_reviews.title: These Chews are really great! As longtime German Shepherd owners we have used ...
customer_reviews.text: These Chews are really great! As longtime German Shepherd owners we have used many different brands and these are right up there with the best. We have purchased less expensive chews and learned that loosely wrapped only last a short time which creates multiple purchases more often thus making them more expensive. These Cowdog Chews Retriever rolls last 2 - 2 1/2 times longer than less expensive chews. These chews will be our 1st go to purchase for a longtime.
customer_reviews.author: dottie

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap - a dangerous choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap, paper thin and unroll too easily. Buyer beware. My dogs ‘peel off’ sheets like this photo and swallow them then get choken. This is a VERY dangerous choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Woodlands Dog Guy

customer_reviews.title: Really good, not as hard as some retriever rolls my ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good, not as hard as some retriever rolls my dogs have tried, these rolls are in ONE PIECE, no small pieces falling out or choking our dogs, the only problem I have with these is that they seem to be bleached and are a little softer, other then that I will buy these again and just supervise my 50 lb. pitbull, because she is an aggressive and fast chewer !
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Great source info and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This Rawhide comes from South America (a known safer source of beef) and NOT from China or any other unknown source. Our big dogs love their rawhide and these are priced right, good quality and fulfilled by Amazon. The quality of the food we give our dogs and their safety are our only concerns. We’ve never been displeased but if you have any issues, you know Amazon will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog, happy owner!
customer_reviews.text: My girl is a chewer, and she loves 'em! Used to find these is the local big box discount store pretty regularly and then they stopped carrying them. Oh no, what to do? Amazon to the rescue! I wish they were cheaper but anything for Pickles the pup I guess! I give her no more than one per week, and usually break it up over two days (she chews it about halfway down, I then take it away and give it back to her to finish the next day). She's always really thirsty after chewing these, so make sure to have plenty of water on hand for your pup!
customer_reviews.author: 12der3gb

customer_reviews.title: the dogs LOVE them and they can chew on one for a ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I though they may be too big for my midsized dogs. Well, they are a little too large, however, the dogs LOVE them and they can chew on one for a couple of days. (Unlike smaller rawhides that they would finish the same day) These are priced right for the size as well so I will be buying more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Questionable processing
customer_reviews.text: Great price but my dog vomited an hour after eating one of these. He’s never had issues with other rawhides either so it must be how these are processed. I will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Schmaltz

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: These used to be fine with my pups, but now they seem to give my pups diarrhea. Our 9 month old lab got really bad diarrhea and ruined his $50 bed, our 3 yr poodle also had some diarrhea but didn't quite eat as much, and our 11 yr old westie waits until the pieces are small enough to swallow and then chokes on them. We waited until their diarrhea cleared up and then gave them the raw hide free Pork Chomps rib bones which seem to agree with them better, but we buy those directly from the pet store, some Amazon reviews were questionable about getting those shipped so just be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kinder

customer_reviews.title: Good but not my first choice
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I have been buying these since Costco stopped carrying the ones I usually bought. These are alright. What I don’t like is that some of them are tightly rolled and some of them are really loosely rolled and take my dog under an hour to eat. I have a St. Bernard and a corgi, they go through them really quickly just because they are destructive puppies but over all alright.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Our dog likes them but the picture provided on the site is just flat out false advertising
customer_reviews.text: See the picture of what we actually got compared to what they lead you to believe you are going to get. It isnt even close. Our dog seems to like them just fine but they dont last very long because they are MAYBE 1/2 of what they advertise. Keep that in mind when you are purchasing them. They are pretty thin. We wont be buying them again and honestly it flat out ticks me off that they can get away with this misleading in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Bloodhound!
customer_reviews.text: Very thick retriever rolls. My bloodhound (a very aggressive chewer) loves these. Takes about two days of constantly chewing for him to chew these down. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: sleepyberry

customer_reviews.title: Our greyhound doesn't like these
customer_reviews.text: Our 5-year old greyhound will eat ANYTHING and EVERYTHING! Seriously. Except these. She tentatively took the first one, gnawed on it briefly, then wouldn't touch it again. We offered her another from the same bag, which she rejected immediately We offered her another chew from another, slightly more expensive brand. She took it and chewed it up in her usual unashamedly noisy manner, so she wasn't ill or suffering indigestion. We had ordered two bags; we returned the unopened bag and discarded the opened bag.
customer_reviews.author: Larry and Yvonne57108

customer_reviews.title: Poor value
customer_reviews.text: No weight given in item description so have to guess about the amount of rawhide in this item from the photo. Of course, the rolls were much smaller than they looked.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L Blier

customer_reviews.title: Doggos love these, longer lasting than regular rawhide chews.
customer_reviews.text: We occasionally buy the bulk large rawhide chews from our local big pet store, about $30 for a big bag. Dogs think they're great, but can polish off one of those big rolls in a couple hours. Kind of a pricey treat. We got this brand because it was slightly cheaper than the big bag, and it meant we didn't have to go to another store during these Covid Times. The Doggos think they're great, and on top of that, these are long-lasting. IT takes a good couple days for them to get gnawed down to nothing, so it's a win-win for everyone. Costs less, lasts longer. Will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good, long lasting rawhides
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with these rawhides. I was formerly buying the retriever rolls from Costco but had to switch once they stopped carrying them. I decided to try these because most of the reviews were very positive about them being thick and lasting a while. Well, I received them and they lived up to my expectations! :D They are smaller in diameter than the Costco ones, but the rawhide is very thick. They last my two 60+ lb dogs quite a long time. I felt the price was comparable to what I was spending at Costco also, so I'll continue getting these for the forseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie G.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog violently ill....twice.
customer_reviews.text: The first time we gave these to my dog, she got sick. Vomiting, and loud, explosive diarrhea, blood in stools. I didn't associate it with these at the time. I just thought she got sick. We forgot all about them and just ran across them in the pantry this week and gave her one. SAME exact symptoms again. These rawhides are the ONLY common denominator. I am REALLY unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: EMStrow

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality Not the same as they were before
customer_reviews.text: These used to be a nice chew and value for the money. Now they seem to have the outside makings of a quality rawhide and the inside of a cheap one. The price went up and quality down big time.
customer_reviews.author: Kikiroo

customer_reviews.title: Falsely Advertised - small diameter - loosely rolled - will not last long.
customer_reviews.text: See the photo of what the add displayed and what was delivered. Much smaller in diameter and loosely rolled. I placed this as a resend of an older order from a year or two back. These are not nearly the same quality as the first order. These would not last very long and are very expensive. I don't know why Amazon lists this as a "choice" item. It also comes in a bag which got pretty beat up in transit.... not in a box as shown online. We buy allot from amazon and this is only the second falsely advertised item I have received. Chris
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cadwell

customer_reviews.title: For some odd reason neither of my dogs will chew these
customer_reviews.text: Same size, same thickness of roll, same appearance... but my two dogs will not chew these rolls. They like Ol' Roy rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the dog
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs will take daaaays to chew on these & really enjoys them. Unfortunately for him, we will not be buying these again because the other dog will bite off and swallow pieces of all sizes. Obviously this is dangerous as it can cause blockages. Supervise your dog(s) the first few times to see how they behave with it. They aren't safe for every dog, but can be good for some dogs.
customer_reviews.author: jnfoundinthewild

customer_reviews.title: Best rawhide chews I have found so far.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best rawhide chew that I have found in terms of longevity. Due to the variation because this is a natural product, not all sticks last as long, but over all they last far longer than anything else I have tried. My problem is my dog tries to swallow the stick whole once half or so is soft. What I have found is that the sticks made from the thickest hides don't necessarily last the longest, but the ones with the most turns with a moderate thickness. The cheaper rawhide chews may only last 30 minutes to an hour. These are lasting from 3-8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: ZathrasOne

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved but not as long-lasting as from another dealer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these retriever rolls when the brand I had been ordering was not available. While they are perfectly good, I think I was spoiled by the previous ones. My dog loves these but eats the entire thing in a rather short time. They don't seem to be rolled as tightly as the others. I will probably buy these again unless I can find my old brand. I don't want to sound negative because they are a pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: bak4

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love em
customer_reviews.text: These are clean. Dogs never get sick, well, We have a male great dane that tries to swallow them whole, but he's learning not to do that when Dad/me reaches into his mouth and pulls it out.....lol. To be fair, this dog will eat anything. As for the bones, I buy them all the time and I'll continue to buy them. In fact, i'm going to order a couple more today.
customer_reviews.author: StuckInTheMiddleWithYou

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Eat Them. Can’t Really Speak to Flavor
customer_reviews.text: My nephews have a dog. The dog likes to chew on these. I was feeling generous and sent her a box. I can’t speak to the flavor because I didn’t chew on them nor will I. Maggie the dog doesn’t have a human Brocca’s area or Wernicke’s area so she can’t communicate to me about the flavor. Shrug emoji. She’s happy. My nephews are happy. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: RCTia

customer_reviews.title: Nutmeg loves them and they last a long time
customer_reviews.text: These last so much longer than any other we have purchased. Usually she can chew through and finish one in an hour or so. These last 2 days! I couldn't believe it. They are very clean and high quality. I'll echo what a previous reviewer posted, please never, never, never leave your dog alone while she enjoys her treat because of the very high choking hazard. If we need to leave, we take it away and give it back to her later. (No she doesn't like that but I'd rather that than lose her.) :-)
customer_reviews.author: bob morris

customer_reviews.title: Pittie Approved and recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Pittie Approved! My pittie is a very avid chewer. I’ve bought MANY “long lasting” chew products only to see them disintegrate within 5 minutes. These keep her occupied a long time - she even takes a break - and those who know pittie-potumuses know they never walk away from food. I’m so happy I ordered these, and they are a very reasonable price. No fake flavoring / coating, so no sticky stains on the rugs and no ‘’bone funk” (anyone have a dog that loves ram horns? *herk*) SaraDog has declared these a must-buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Garcia

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion these are poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: These Chew sticks are not extra thick yes they’re in one sheet but it is a very very thin piece of rawhide which actually appears to be brutal as the dogs chew on it to dogs of mine have thrown them up Within minutes of beginning to chew them. I cannot give this quality to my dogs. My big question now is Amazon prime may be quick and easy but what happens now that I need to return them. I consider them defective. I’m hoping someone will pay for their return.
customer_reviews.author: linda lesher

customer_reviews.title: Do not give these to your dog unsupervised
customer_reviews.text: The rolls unwrap way too easily ! I bought these for a 20 pound teddy bear dog, I will admit she has a vicious chewer But we have used other rawhides without this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: May be a good product, our dogs would not chew them.
customer_reviews.text: We have three large dogs and they all chew like demons. I liked the price and reviews on these so purchased. They came fast and were packed well. They look good and tough. However, none of the dogs would have anything to do with them. I had to go back to our other brand. The only thing I can figure is the smell. These have no smell what so ever. Dogs love smells. We smelled the old brand to compare and there was a defined smell to them. I donated these so they did not waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Rejected by dog
customer_reviews.text: These rawhide chew sticks looked great to me. Tightly rolled without any awful smell. Unfortunately, I had to return them because my dog totally rejected them. He would not touch one. He normally devours about one rawhide stick (by a different brand) every couple of days. No accounting for taste?
customer_reviews.author: Tzar Igor

customer_reviews.title: My dog is not interested as she's been with other rawhide 'bones'
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to save some money over the 3 pack of another brand. My dog devoured 3 large rawhide 'bones' from a different company last week. This week she has barely shown any interest in these rawhide rolls... nibbling on two of them briefly and then ignoring them.
customer_reviews.author: ponz

customer_reviews.title: Somethings changed...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these the first time and quite pleased with them. My cane Corso loved them and would make quick work of them in about an hour. She loved them. Purchase them a second time (september 2019) a few months later and now my dog won't eat them. Something has changed and now I have 20 rolls that are essentially garbage. So very disappointing. They look similar to the first batch, but something must be wrong with them if a dog that loves rawhide will no longer chew them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No odour or glues. Great length and value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these for my dogs and also for a friends. Friends dog is a “power chewer” and will enjoy this rather quickly. Has zero chemical/bleach odours and no obvious glue either. Length is a true 9-10” and is a bit narrower/tighter rolled than similar ones found in stores. They do offer a bit larger diameter roll if your dog chews more aggressively. Mine don’t and they “savour” theirs compared to my friends dog who has been limited to 3 per week now and mine are still working on 1 in 2 weeks!!
customer_reviews.author: Pyr Lover

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant value, our big dog loves them, thirst-inducing
customer_reviews.text: Wow, $1 for a length of raw-hide. These things are AWESOMELY priced! Some observations: - Bag says product of Bolivia. I don't know if I've ever bought a darn thing made in Bolivia, but they look good and the dog loves them. - Our dog is CRAZY THIRSTY after eating one. I've not noticed this with other rawhides, but maybe it's universal? Have the water bowl full, just in case. - Rawhides, generally, are calorie rich. It's like eating an extra cup of food. Just bear that in mind for your dog's overall diet. I didn't know this, so I thought I'd share :D
customer_reviews.author: Cybernetic.Eve

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for aggressive chewers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use to entertain my Australian Shepherd puppy who is an aggressive chewer. I’ve purchased other brands in the past, and none have been able to last as long with my puppy than these. They are a great size, long-lasting and offer a lot of value for the price. Overall, I can’t recommend these enough for anyone with an aggressive chewer for a fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: the.design.jedi

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Fido From Chewing Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Rawhide gives your dog gas and it gets on the carpet. I've never found one that didn't and these are no different. It still beats replacing and repairing furniture and other items in the home. Give your pup something to chew on or they'll find something on their own. These last about the same as any other rawhide and my dogs seem to love them. Kinda interesting that Amazon asked me to rate the flavor. Perhaps I should do a taste comparison? Get these for your dog. Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C.

customer_reviews.title: Tougher/Thicker Dog Chews Last Longer
customer_reviews.text: We received our second shipment of Cowdog Chews recently. These cost a bit more than a near identical item at WalMart but these are thicker and somewhat harder to chew. This is important because our Doberman has very strong teeth and she would consume one of the WalMart rawhide chews in about 2 hours. These Cowdog Chews last a day to a day in a half because they are tougher and not as easy to consume.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: These made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited because this was a good price and a lot of rawhide bones but every time he ate them he would end up throwing up. Dogs normally eat them and if they aren't soft enough when they swallow they throw pieces of the rawhide back up but this was different. He was throwing up stomach acid every single time I tried to give them to him. I tried several times over a couple weeks before I just threw all of them away. It looks like a good deal but its not a good treat if it makes them sick.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: nice value
customer_reviews.text: The left one is bought from other store, $7.99 for 3. My dog love them. I found 20 bag is cheaper on amazon, the size is similar, my dog haven’t tried it yet. I am already happy for the size
customer_reviews.author: Elaine W.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting. Gave dog upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: Since introducing this brand of rawhide to my dog, she started having diarrhea. I stopped giving her this brand, and went back to our previous brand, and she has since returned to normal stools. These are really thin, and each one wouldn’t last a day.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ward

customer_reviews.title: Received a bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: Bought these several times and my 2 dogs loved them. My last purchase I bought 2 batches, 1 dog wont touch them and the other vomits everytime he chews on one. I'm not sure what changed. Maybe a bad batch, but I will be trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a couple orders of these rolls and my dog loves them. She is a German Shepherd/Siberian Husky mix, medium/large dog, and she will tear through one of these in a day or two. I give her one once or twice a week when she needs something to do, and she is occupied for hours. I have had no issues and no reason to be concerned choking hazards or anything. I will continue to buy these rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Easy for dog to chew up
customer_reviews.text: I have a 50 pound lab/pointer mix that I give 10 inch rawhide bones. She is what I call a medium chewer and usually it takes her 2 to 3 days to chew 5 to 6 inches off the bone. These only take her less than one day to chew down to where I take them away from her at about 4 inches. However they are very reasonably priced, and she loves them so I will use them.
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Tried it, like it, ruined by popularity
customer_reviews.text: Theyre decent bones; nice size, seems to last a day or two, and doesn’t make the dogs sick. All great qualities to have in a product, however the supplier has raised the price almost $6 bucks since I started ordering. As nice as they are, this is a treat for my dogs and when you reorder monthly, that $6 adds up. I’ll sadly be on the hunt for a new supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.McKoy

customer_reviews.title: The dogs were happy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that these are rolled much tighter than many of the other products that are similar to this. The dogs thoroughly enjoyed them, and personally, I have found no issues with them thus far. 2 German Shepherds did well with them, and I also have 2 dachshunds, that like them also. Obviously, they last much longer with the Dachshunds, than they do with the German Shepherds.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin L.

customer_reviews.title: Expected delivery in a box for easy storage.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has not started chewing on his rawhide yet and I gave it to him a couple of days ago. They are different than the ones he has had previously.....so don't know if that's the problem. Hopefully he'll get used to it!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: First two bags ok, 3rd made pup ill
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting, comparatively speaking, for my aggressive chewers. However I suspect quality control issues. Our first two purchases were consumed without issue. This third shipment which we had put on subscribe and save, had a bit of an odor. Additionally, after two successful months, this bag is causing stomach upset for my year old heeler. We are tossing this product, and going to look for a long lasting chew that won't upset his stomach.
customer_reviews.author: M.M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Can be eaten totally in 10 minutes !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they were out of stock on the Larger rolls. The larger rolls are thicker in diameter as well. What a difference. One of our labs ate one of these totally in 10 minutes!! Gone!!!! Not safe in my opinion for large labradors or the like. Do not buy if concerned over how fast they can be eaten. I’m tossing the bag out.
customer_reviews.author: Prof M

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: I've got 3 big dogs. Rawhide rolls are the only chew option that all 3 actually enjoy. These are super thick so it seems to last a bit longer. The price compared to other local stores is way better. I've bought this brand a few times and I've never had any issues like digestion with any of the dogs (including one elderly lab).
customer_reviews.author: JMMorton

customer_reviews.title: Heavy chewers need these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have a puppy? A heavy chewer? Just buy these! They work well to occupy your pup! I leave a few around when I leave the house, so that when I come home the chances of something being chewed up are less. Pitbull puppy love to chew, and these seem to help. Also, they seem to help with separation anxiety, which is why my pup gets into trouble. Hopefully with these around my pup will be less destructive. I personally like them for my pups, and they seem to love them.
customer_reviews.author: J.Gross

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: My 20lb mutt and 80lb German Shepherd love these things. The little dog can make one of these last for over a month, but my German Shepherd can chew up 2 in 24 hours. Some of the sticks are rolled really tight and nice and others are a little looser, pretty consistent sizes throughout the bag though. Just wish they lasted a little longer for my big dog
customer_reviews.author: ChefWeeWee

customer_reviews.title: Very skinny and didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: We switched up our rawhide chews to this slightly more expensive brand looking for a thicker rawhide roll that was still 9-10” long. The current product stated that the chews were 1” width. Unfortunately they seemed to gain this diameter by the rolls being somewhat pressed where they have 1” in one dimension and less than/equal to half inch in the opposite dimension. The rawhides also lasted a very short time compared to our other brand (albeit our large dogs are tougher chewers). We will be transitioning back to the cheaper and thicker rawhide rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Thome

customer_reviews.title: Thinner and not as tightly rolled as the product photos
customer_reviews.text: In the product photos each roll looks like they were made of 6-7 tightly wrapped layers; however, the rolls I I received were only 3-4 loosely wrapper layers. Further, the product claims the average diameter for a roll is 1.25", but the rolls I received were all between 3/4" and 1" in diameter. Given the inconsistencies between what is advertised and what I received I will not purchase this product again and cannot recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great way to keep intense chewers occupied.
customer_reviews.text: My German shepherd is a really intense chewer. He goes through one of these things in 2 days tops. I decided to buy in bulk and it made my life so much easier. He chews these instead of everything else in the house and it keeps him busy. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Pezza

customer_reviews.title: They are alot thinner BUT take way way longer to chew!!!
customer_reviews.text: When they came I was very upset, thought they were puny. Then i gave them to my dogs. Mine usually eat with in half hour a whole one. These were still around the next day. Now they do prefer the easier ones as they rip them apart. But these burgers last last last. I have weims and 5 at that. They have to have stuff to chew. They dont carry them around and chew here, chew there, they try to devour right away. So I'm definitely impressed and will but these again.
customer_reviews.author: Hope H.

customer_reviews.title: Read item description. Don't rely on the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Item pictures are misleading. The rawhide are much thinner than the pictures show. The length is accurate, but my dog chewed one up within an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Halvorson

customer_reviews.title: My Labrador Retriever Loves These Retriever Rolls
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them - keeps going to the garage door to indicate he would like me to get one for him. This was a great price for the quantity and size. Just reminded me that I need to order more. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shan M.

customer_reviews.title: One of the healthier online options
customer_reviews.text: My 120-pound Doberman gets a little nervous during the day and these rawhide bones help calm him. I've noticed that some brands cause him to have gas and others he does not finish for whatever reason. These chews are clean and long-lasting. It's nice to have a large quantity of a healthier product shipped to my home.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Scott Davies

customer_reviews.title: 35 pound Blue healer and 2 pound pets are enjoying these raw hides
customer_reviews.text: These are similar to the ones I have been buying the only difference is they are smaller around and do not last them as long. Often my mothers dog which I a lab/basset hound mix visits and she has jaws very strong (jaws of life) and she has been able to chew these raw hides faster than the other ones I have purchased. It would be a better product for my pets and visiting pets to have raw hides to be stronger/tougher for them to chew for their well being. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: boojoe2

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for hours
customer_reviews.text: So if you want a dog chew that lasts more than 4 minutes, these are them. They are rather large, but my 25 pound and 35 pound dogs love them and takes about 3 hours to eat. I usually take they away after an hour and save for later. You can also cut them in half with a band saw if you wanted to. I don't really like for them to eat the last inch or so because I am afraid of the choking hazzard. Nice product with simple ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Jarvah

customer_reviews.title: Best rawhide bones
customer_reviews.text: My cattle dog is a tough chewer. She devours everything in record time. This bone is fantastic as it lasts many hours. I've never seen any splintering or anything that made me nervous while she chewed. Rawhide isn't always my 1st choice, but for longevity, it the only one that lasts. My dog loves loves these.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: just too thin
customer_reviews.text: I must say they must have a good flavor. My German Sheppard gobbles them right up. I thought i was ordering extra thick ones maybe I ordered the wrong ones but these would not be described as thick. maybe and inch average. i realized after arriving that my listing didnt say extra thick. On average i say she goes through about one a day. I still must say they came quickly and the dog does seem to like them. I think I'll just look for a thicker option next time.
customer_reviews.author: Quad Ram

customer_reviews.title: Doberman Puppy Enjoys Them
customer_reviews.text: These are much more long lasting than other brands, and my 10 months old Doberman puppy needs a couple of days to finish one off. So far so good. The only complaint is and the reason for the one star reduction, that the price is really high. It is skin after all and not human grade food. Should not cost that much.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a bloodhound, coonhound and pit mix, they all loved em! Kept them chewing for the hours I have to leave. Sometimes find around the house but they're usually ate in one sitting. Takes a good 1 1/2-2 hours to fully consume it. Could post choking hazard for smaller breeds but my dogs have no issues eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

customer_reviews.title: Best distraction/chew ever
customer_reviews.text: We've had other raw hide type chews, but this is definitely the best. Lasts longer than others (about an hour for our 1 1⁄2 year old catahoula), and he's always excited to have one. They're pretty dense, which is what allows them to last so long, and they're large—like 10-12" or so. We subscribe and get these delivered on a recurring basis. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rousseau

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth
customer_reviews.text: The value was excellent. I thought all rawhide was the same, but these are unique and I cannot tell if I like them or not. I have 2 big dogs that love to chew rawhide. They do not seem to LOVE this brand--not sure if it is that super smooth texture, or that they are wrapped so tight...?
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for very large dogs
customer_reviews.text: I suppose if you have a very large dog, this dog would love these chew treats. My dogs are medium sized about 50 lb each, and they like these for the first 5 minutes, but they never want to touch it again after that. I tried putting peanut butter on them, but they just lick the peanut butter off and left the chew treat alone. I'm not saying that these are bad, but they're probably best for very large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Klozoff

customer_reviews.title: Not the most helpful review.
customer_reviews.text: I give these to my boxers every once in a while. This is the only brand I’ve used that will give my dogs bowel problems the next day. My dogs are still pretty young (all under 2 years), so I’m not sure if the diarrhea is due to the sog size/bone size ratio, or if it’s the brand itself. To combat this, I only let the dogs munch on about half of the rawhide before taking it up. Seems to have solved the issue. I will probably buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Decent sized pack. My German Shepherd goes through all rawhide really fast, so having a lot comes in handy since she is a chewer. Local store only carry the smaller packs which we go through too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I've heard these (rawhide) are not the best for your pup, but I just can't STAND the smell of bully sticks OR the price of them. These bones last my 75 lb. boxer mix 30 minutes to an hour. And I like that this brand has less artificial preservatives. I will buy again, they arrive quick and my dog just can't wait to have one.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: My American Bulldog mix is a major chewer. I give her one of these every 3 to 4 days. They keep her from chewing on things she should not. When she has chewed about half the roll (takes 1 to 2 days) she will bring it to me to put a dab of peanut butter on the chewed end. She finishes it off, a very happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Flo Jo

customer_reviews.title: Long enough but very thin
customer_reviews.text: Barely an inch in diameter. I should have just ordered the ones I got from costco. These won't last long at all due to how thin they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Braughton

customer_reviews.title: Dog eats everything except for these!
customer_reviews.text: I thought about not getting these because they’re just plain flavor but my dog eats everything...well except for these hahah. Highly disappointed and would love to return them. I’ll take down my review if they take them back. Only used one and it’s still not been chewed on. Maybe I can use them to build a castle!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: To small of a diameter
customer_reviews.text: Not happy, compared to other brands I have used the diameter of there is very small. Would not have bought if I saw them first. I do not really recommend but my dogs seem to like them. I will not purchase again. Not a good value for the money. Also don't believe the ads picture. They look nothing like that.
customer_reviews.author: W. jann

customer_reviews.title: Chews are much to hard, dog can not chew
customer_reviews.text: My 70lb lab/Shepard could not chew through these. She would just chew on the ends and never make any progress because they are to hard. She doesn't have this trouble with other brands I've purchased from Walmart. I had to give away the bag because they would just be left around the house. Waste of money on my end for trying to buy in bulk. To hard dogs can't chew them waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd mix and a Great Pyrenees who go nuts over these chews. My dogs go through chews quickly, especially my German Shepherd mix. These chews sometimes come with a funky smell, but they last far longer than the chews I get at the local pet store, and they just generally seem like they're better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Minerva

customer_reviews.title: Thick bone that takes time to chew
customer_reviews.text: These rawhides take our 2 large dogs a few hours, at minimum, to eat unlike some of the similar, thinner bones. Sometimes they are even unable to finish them in one sitting. A 20-pack at this price throws the comparable "knot rawhide" bones from the pet store under the bus. Two of those types of bones that take the same amount of time to chew are more than the price of 20 of these. Glad I finally found an affordable, long-lasting rawhide my dogs can enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Chewy Quality
customer_reviews.text: I rated the thickness and longevity as high because they are thick and do last longer than other brands. The problem I see, especially with this new bag, is the haedness of the product. I have an 171 lb Great Dane and she has a difficult time trying to shred the chewy and at times just walks away from it. I tried to soften the chewy with a hammer and was not successful.
customer_reviews.author: WFM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for wood sticks
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves wood sticks so I've been looking for something to replace them that would not endanger his health. These chews are perfect! They have the right amount of give and resistance that perfectly mimicks a wood stick. I will definitely buy these regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Kalen Vavla

customer_reviews.title: Did they change the recipe?!?!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved the first box we bought, looked and felt like true rawhide. He went through them crazy fast. However, he’s not that thrilled with the second box we purchased, very hard and seems like a plastic material. He has barely touched after few weeks now. Probably will not but again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned when I looked at them as they seem to be smaller diameter and thickness of the material. My dog loves them and they last a longer time that others that I have tried. Not any smell and don't think they have a good test but they get over it.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: I asked my dog about the flavor but he just stared at me and kept chewing.
customer_reviews.text: About a dollar a piece so not too bad. Just your standard rawhide. My dog seems to like them so would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Frogwear

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Our pit bull mix and Catahoula loved these. They last longer than ones bought in big box stores and aren't from China. One big difference I've noticed is that these are thinner than ones I've bought at big box stores but the layers are tightly rolled and are thick. They've lasted a long time even with the powerful jaws of our pit bull chomping away. They're a great treat for cleaning teeth too.
customer_reviews.author: DrAwkwArD

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are very thick and last a long time. My dog is a great dane/labrador mix and he loves chewing rawhides. This usually takes him a few days to chew one. He seems to really love it. My other dog is an aggressive chewer (rotweiler/shepherd mix) and this seems to slow him down and he can make this last longer than a normal bone.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Reid

customer_reviews.title: Much improved
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than versions that I have purchased at local pet stores. My hard chewing lab is busy for about 30 minutes chewing on them. I think these might be a bit over priced, but I will continue to buy these unless I find another one at a better value.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Gym Bone
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets a gym bone when ever I work out. He only gets to chew on the gym bone with I'm outside with him working out. He LOVES these bones. He tries to sneak them in the house, and steal his sisters bone. They last forever (even with my power chewer) Great idea if you need an easy long lasting bone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A great rawhide chew for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: These Retriever rolls are great. My dog loves them. She is a power chewer, and it keeps her occupied for about 2 hours or longer. They are made from one continuous piece, with no small filler pieces. High quality. Not very thick though. I switch between these, and the Premium Retriever rolls, which are thicker, and she prefers the thicker ones. Best of all they are affordable and NOT made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Mg

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog
customer_reviews.text: Although the rolled rawhide sheet is thicker than what I used to get for my dog, the overall diameter of these bones is smaller than I was expecting. I have a boxer and he really enjoys them. He takes anywhere from 2-4 hours eating one over a day or two. He has had no digestive issues. Unlike our previous rawhide rolls, these seem to be consistently made of a single piece of rawhide. Our other brand usually had some smaller fragments rolled up inside of them. They are a bit more expensive than I'd like, but I'm happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Latta

customer_reviews.title: Gotta supervise your pup as package instructs.  Dog will love the chew, but it goes fast!
customer_reviews.text: I love that they come on time! Our 1 year old Lab pup has one a day. Used to keep her busy for an hour or two, but she is a chewer, so now lasts her merely 30 minutes at the most! Still better than store bought ones that sell for $3.99 each tho! My dog has a subscription for these bones!
customer_reviews.author: Gramma

customer_reviews.title: I'm just guessing
customer_reviews.text: I cannot state whether the flavor is there, having not tried it, but my dog sure loves these. When they aren't being buried in different parts of the yard, she passes many pleasurable moments chewing on them. I'll buy a while box again. Well worth the cost of not having to keep buying expensive ones at the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Hunger for Knowledge

customer_reviews.title: Really large rawhides! Glad they were...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I admit I didn’t full read the description and surprisingly received this massive bag of rawhide. At first I thought they would be way too big for my 25lb rat terrier, but they ended up being perfect for him. He had a great lengthy time chewing on this, and it seems to have made a difference for his teeth, too. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Dog's don't seem to like them
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs would go through rawhides, pretty quickly. With these, they don't seem to like them that much. I throw one of these and another brand and they take the other brand. Not sure what the difference is, but my German Sheppard and Pit Bull are not fans of these.
customer_reviews.author: David Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Great price for rawhides!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog (blue nose pit I’ll) is a heavy chewer and these rawhides will keep him busy. He loves these rawhide and it is perfect because these are a great price. I would highly recommend buying these for any dog mom with a busy dog like mine!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Paul

customer_reviews.title: Dog Not Interested In Them
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the product itself. Seemed tightly rolled and good enough size, but my dog just isn't interested in them. Mouths it for a minute and then just ignores them. Would rather chew hard plastic than these bones. Loves a chicken-flavored one at the local pet store, but those are $10 each! Sorry, puppy, not going to happen (again).
customer_reviews.author: Jamesarr

customer_reviews.title: My dog will not chew these
customer_reviews.text: My lab is an avid rawhide chewer, but she is not the least bit interested in these chew sticks. I even tried soaking them in beef boulion for some flavor and that made no difference. I was very impressed with their quality in the way they looked. I gave her a second one thinking it may have been something wrong with just the one, but that was not the problem. I am sitting here with 18 untouched chew sticks and I'm out $25. I gave them a 5 on logevity since they will vertually last forever in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W.

customer_reviews.title: One and Done
customer_reviews.text: Looking for rawhide bones as Costco rarely carries them anymore. The price was decent but the very first thing I noticed when I opened the box was the horrible horrible smell. It smelt like throw up. Really bad throw up. I gag every time I smell the bag and the stench lingers on your hand once you have touched bag or bone. My dog will chew them sometimes. He doesn’t go after him like the Costco bones. Unfortunately I will have to keep searching because the horrible smell is a deal breaker for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, long lasting, our dogs favorite
customer_reviews.text: My golden doodle loves these. She is teething, so I have lots of choices of size shape and texture for her so when I catch her trying to eat a soda can I can offer her a chew toy replacement. Our dog really goes to town on these and they last quite awhile. She has lots of options and she chooses these more than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: DecemberRain

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn’t like them
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would write a review for dog bones but my dog doesn’t seem to like these very much. He likes the Costco rawhides more and will leave one of these to the side; they must smell different to him. Maybe your dog will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: First thing I didn’t like was it didn’t come in the box like in the picture, only in the bag. That’s the reason for a 4 star instead of 5. My dog loves it though. It smelled these before I took it out of the mail box and went crazy for them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jmags

product_meta.title: Cowdog Chews Retriever roll 9-10 inch All Natural Rawhide Product
feature_bullets: ✅ These are natural, handcrafted products of animal origin. That means that there will be some variations from the measures, color and picture representation. Rawhide differs in color, thickness and density like any other natural product.
✅ All natural, dental chews made from free-range, pasture-raised cattle sourced from South America
✅ Chewing also keeps dogs’ jaws strong, teeth clean, and breath a bit fresher. Dogs that chew regularly on rawhides have less plaque and tartar build-up on teeth.

✅ No artificial colors or preservatives and odorless. These are natural, handcrafted products of animal origin. That means that there will be some variations from the measures, color and picture representation. Rawhide differs in color, thickness and density like any other natural product.
✅ New Packaging Image. You may still receive our previous label image since we have stock with the old labeling.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
